i got disconnected, have you pasted the output of 'lsmod' yet?

the good news is that everything looks like it should.... driver is there, but cdrom isn't seen at startup. The not so good news is that it might be a hardware-problem (your system is ooold ... :-) ) Have you checked all cable connections recently? can you boot a CD ?
